scripts.global.installs: npm i -g rimraf && npm i -g typescript
scripts.build.bluetooth: cd nativescript-bluetooth && rm -rf node_modules *.tgz && npm i && tsc && npm pack
scripts.ns.setup: npm uninstall -g nativescript && npm install -g nativescript
scripts.clean: rm -rf hooks node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.nativescript.bluetooth: cd nativescript-bluetooth && rm -rf hooks node_modules && npm i
scripts.clean.xplat.mobile: cd xplat/mobile && rm -rf hooks node_modules && npm i
scripts.nuki: npm run clean && npm run clean.nativescript.bluetooth && npm run clean.xplat.mobile && npm run se.clean && npm run pt.clean
scripts.pt.m.clean: cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.pt.m.a: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns run android --env.aot
scripts.pt.m.start.android: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile-mobile && tns run android --env.aot
scripts.pt.m.start.android.report: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns run android --env.aot --env.report
scripts.pt.m.i: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns run ios --env.aot
scripts.pt.m.start.ios: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns run ios --env.aot
scripts.pt.m.start.ios.report: npm i && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns run ios --env.aot --env.report
scripts.pt.m.ios.release: npm run nuki && cd apps/pushtracker-mobile && tns build ios --release --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.pt.m.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker > layout-profile.txt
scripts.pt.m.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.se.clean: cd apps/smart-eval && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.se.a: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run android --env.aot
scripts.se.start.android: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run android --env.aot
scripts.se.start.android.report: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run android --env.aot --env.report
scripts.se.i: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run ios --env.aot
scripts.se.start.ios: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run ios --env.aot
scripts.se.start.ios.report: npm i && cd apps/smart-eval && tns run ios --env.aot --env.report
scripts.se.ios.release: npm run nuki && cd apps/smart-eval && tns build ios --release --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.se.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartevaluation > layout-profile.txt
scripts.se.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartevaluation framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.sd.w.brad: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && tns run android --bundle --device 8606X91120272
scripts.sd.w.a: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle
scripts.sd.w.a.report: cd apps/smartdrive && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.sd.w.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.sd.w.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.pt.w.brad: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && tns run android --bundle --device 8606X91120272
scripts.pt.w.a: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle
scripts.pt.w.a.report: cd apps/pushtracker && tsc && npm run scss && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.pt.w.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.pt.w.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.pushtracker.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
